content.body: apparently typescript is going to add extra non-standard syntax for decorators (specifically, allowing them before `export` as well as after)

content.body: I think others have had this issue; trying to commit GH suggestions on ecma262 PRs it always errors with "This diff has recently been updated". Any ideas/tips?
Ashley Claymore: nope, it just doesn't work

content.body: seems to be a consequence of the large file size, which hopefully will be fixed at some point like the context expansion was
